comments.en:
My first foray into Linux but I got this printer to work just about! I used the printer setup from control panel - ASCII prints fine, but there are currently no KXP drivers/filters so you have to use the HP Laserjet one. It doesn't work perfectly, the bottom of the page was cut off but I'm sure someone with a better understanding of these things could fix it easily enough.

Consumables/Refills: Toner (approx 30USD)
